```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(here)
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(janitor)
library(writexl)
```

```{r}
# unit conversions
kwh_to_btu = 3412.1416
mil_kwh_to_tbtu = kwh_to_btu * (10^6) / (10^12)
```

```{r}
# read in raw mecs tables
raw3_5 = read_excel(here("data", "Table3_5.xlsx"))
raw3_6 = read_excel(here("data", "Table3_6.xlsx"))
raw7_7 = read_excel(here("data", "Table7_7.xlsx"))
raw11_1 = read_excel(here("data", "Table11_1.xlsx"))
raw11_3 = read_excel(here("data", "Table11_3.xlsx"))
raw11_5 = read_excel(here("data", "Table11_5.xlsx"))
```
